Marcel Lazar, who used the alias "Guccifer," entered his guilty plea before Judge James Cacheris in U.S. District Court, Alexandria, Virginia, the department said in a statement.
But the Justice Department statement did not confirm this claim, and a law enforcement official said investigators did not find evidence to support the claim.
In recent media interviews, Lazar claimed he had easily hacked into Clinton's controversial private email server.
